data.sentence: The word أَنْ comes from the root ا ن and is associated with the meanings:
The word بَلَى comes from the root ب ل ي and is associated with the meanings: decay, wear out.

data.meanings: to measure/decree/determine/stint/straiten, to have power, to be able, a measure, means, ability, a term/decree, doom, destiny, measured, decreed.qudrun - knowledge, law, value, power, measure, majesty, ability, glory, honour, standard, limit, destiny. taqdir - knowledge, law, measuring decree, judgement, ordering. maqduran - made absolute, executed. miqdar - due measurement, definite quantity. qidr (pl. qudurun) - cooking pot. qaddara - to make possible, prepare, devise, lay plan, facilitate. muqtadir - powerful, able to prevail.
data.sentence: The word قَادِرِينَ comes from the root ق د ر and is associated with the meanings: to measure/decree/determine/stint/straiten, to have power, to be able, a measure, means, ability, a term/decree, doom, destiny, measured, decreed.qudrun - knowledge, law, value, power, measure, majesty, ability, glory, honour, standard, limit, destiny. taqdir - knowledge, law, measuring decree, judgement, ordering. maqduran - made absolute, executed. miqdar - due measurement, definite quantity. qidr (pl. qudurun) - cooking pot. qaddara - to make possible, prepare, devise, lay plan, facilitate. muqtadir - powerful, able to prevail.

data.meanings: to be worth, equivalent to. sawwa - to level, complete, arrange, make uniform, even, congruous, consistent in parts, fashion in a suitable manner, make adapted to the exigencies or requirements, perfect a thing, put a thing into a right or good state. istawa - to establish, become firm or firmly settled, turn to a thing, to direct one's attention to a thing, mount. ala sawain - on terms of equality, i.e. in such a manner that each party should know that it is free of its obligations, at par. sawiyyun  -even, right, sound in mind and body. sawiyyan - being in sound health.. sawwa (vb. 2) to proportion, fashion, perfect, level, equal, fill the space. sawa - midst.
data.sentence: The word نُسَوِّيَ comes from the root س و ي and is associated with the meanings: to be worth, equivalent to. sawwa - to level, complete, arrange, make uniform, even, congruous, consistent in parts, fashion in a suitable manner, make adapted to the exigencies or requirements, perfect a thing, put a thing into a right or good state. istawa - to establish, become firm or firmly settled, turn to a thing, to direct one's attention to a thing, mount. ala sawain - on terms of equality, i.e. in such a manner that each party should know that it is free of its obligations, at par. sawiyyun  -even, right, sound in mind and body. sawiyyan - being in sound health.. sawwa (vb. 2) to proportion, fashion, perfect, level, equal, fill the space. sawa - midst.

data.meanings: the extremities or ends (fingers/toes), limbs, members of the body (arms, hands, legs etc).
data.sentence: The word بَنَانَهُ comes from the root ب ن ن and is associated with the meanings: the extremities or ends (fingers/toes), limbs, members of the body (arms, hands, legs etc).
